channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform (Web Intelligence)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform (Web Intelligence)

item.title: CVE-2019-0333|2024-08-04T17:44:16.500Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform%20%28web%20intelligence%29
item.description: In some situations, when a client cancels a query in SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform (Web Intelligence), versions 4.2, 4.3, the attacker can then query and receive the whole data set instead of just what is part of their authorized security profile, resulting in Information Disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2019-0382|2024-08-04T17:51:26.301Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform%20%28web%20intelligence%29
item.description: A Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability exists in SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform (Web Intelligence-Publication related pages); corrected in version 4.2. Privileges are required in order to exploit this vulnerability.
